title: What are the pros and cons of the Kawai CN21 digital piano? What are other good options? - Quora

response.answer_text: I found a link that gave some information about this model.CN 21 Digital Piano It appears to be a nice digital piano with decent specifications. I played the sound samples and they seemed good. I could not locate any place in the Phoenix area that has one of these, and I could not find a price. I don’t know where you live, but if you lived around here I’d advise finding a more commonly available model rather than having the only one within hundreds of miles with doubtful service opportunities. I found another link Piano World Piano & Digital Piano Forums to a blog in which someone apparently familiar with this model gave this response to a question about the Kawai CN21: The CN21 is an entry-level console digital piano initially launched in early 2007. While still a good starter piano, I believe that keyboard and sound technology has improved considerably in the past 5-6 years. $300 is a fair price to pay for an older, entry-level model such as the CN21, however given your acoustic piano background, I would recommend saving for a little longer to purchase a more modern instrument. Kind regards,Jamesx _________________________Employed by Kawai Japan, however the opinions I express are my own.Nord Electro 3 fan & occasional rare groove player. Top
